name: part_016
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY1】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment hololive stage1 DAY1【チラ見せ】 [00xeNL3vdQo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_016.mov

scenes.description: Transition from darkness to the stage as Shirogane Noel appears.
Shirogane Noel performs her solo song 'Gyuu-don-don-don-Gyuu!'.
The stage goes dark as the performance concludes and transitions to the next segment.
Introductory graphic sequence for the next performance featuring Amane Kanata and Houshou Marine.

subtitles.original:
ぎゅーどん どーんどん ぎゅー どん ぎゅー
ぎゅーどん どーんどん ぎゅー どん ぎゅー
subtitles.english:
Gyu-don-don-don-gyu-don-gyu
Gyu-don-don-don-gyu-don-gyu

subtitles.original:
ぎゅーどん どーんどん ぎゅー どん ぎゅー
ギュッとしてどーん！
subtitles.english:
Gyu-don-don-don-gyu-don-gyu
Hug me tight and BAM!

subtitles.original: せーの、ギュッとしてどーん！
subtitles.english: One, two, hug me tight and BAM!

subtitles.original: 大好き！ギュッとしてどーん！
subtitles.english: I love you! Hug me tight and BAM!

subtitles.original: おろしポン酢かけて さっぱりとハピハピ
subtitles.english: Drizzled with grated radish and ponzu, refreshing and happy-happy

subtitles.original:
豪華に特盛りワッショイ！
(ぎゅっぎゅっぎゅっ ぎゅっぎゅっぎゅっぎゅっぎゅ)
subtitles.english:
Go big with an extra-large serving, heave-ho!
(Gyu-gyu-gyu, gyu-gyu-gyu-gyu-gyu)

subtitles.original: つゆだく生卵 トッピングはお好み (おいしー)
subtitles.english: Extra broth and a raw egg, toppings as you like (Delicious!)

subtitles.original: のれんをさあくぐろう 笑顔で決めたいね
subtitles.english: Let's pass through the shop curtain, I want to end with a smile

subtitles.original: はい、ハラペコのバブちゃんたち こっちでちゅよー
subtitles.english: Alright, my hungry babies, come this way!

subtitles.original: 食べる前に お姉さんと運動しまちょうね
subtitles.english: Before we eat, let's exercise with Big Sis!

subtitles.original:
ヘイ、カモン、エブリバディ、サンナポ！
アーユーハングリー？
subtitles.english:
Hey, come on everybody, sunnapo!
Are you hungry?

subtitles.original:
ぎゅっぎゅっぎゅっ ぎゅっぎゅっぎゅっ
からの いただきまーしゅ！
subtitles.english:
Gyu-gyu-gyu, gyu-gyu-gyu,
and now... Let's eat!

subtitles.original: さあさ ぎゅーどんだ ぎゅーどんだ 一緒に食べよう
subtitles.english: Come on, it's beef bowl time, it's beef bowl time, let's eat together

subtitles.original: 君と仲良しハニーバニー そろそろふわわい
subtitles.english: Being good friends with you, honey-bunny, getting light-headed soon

subtitles.original: ほろりお肉 お肉 詰まっちゃダメー！
subtitles.english: The melt-in-your-mouth meat, the meat, don't get choked up!

subtitles.original:
全部食べたいんだ 褒めちゃいな
なでなでよしよし ちゅっちゅっちゅ
subtitles.english:
I want to eat it all, so praise me,
there-there, good girl, kiss-kiss-kiss

subtitles.original: せーの、ぎゅーどん！
subtitles.english: One, two, Gyu-don!

subtitles.original: えっ、牛丼が嫌い？ もう、なんでそういうこと言うの！
subtitles.english: Eh, you hate beef bowls? Geez, why would you say that?!

subtitles.original: そんな悪い子は 食べちゃうぞ！
subtitles.english: I'll eat up bad kids like you!

subtitles.original: 好き好き大好き ラブラブラブ せーの、ぎゅー！
subtitles.english: I like you, I like you, I love you, love-love-love, one, two, Gyu!

subtitles.original: むちむち 責めちゃダメ ドキドキしちゃった ほっぺにちゅ
subtitles.english: Stop picking on my squishiness, you made my heart race, kiss on the cheek

subtitles.original: モグモグ ねぎだく (へい！) ところが全然足りません
subtitles.english: Munch, munch, extra green onions (Hey!), but it's not enough at all

subtitles.original: バクバク つゆだく (へい！) それでも全然足りません
subtitles.english: Chomp, chomp, extra broth (Hey!), still not enough at all

subtitles.original: バクバク 肉だく (あん！) まだまだ全然足りないの
subtitles.english: Chomp, chomp, extra meat (Ahn!), it's still not enough at all

subtitles.original: バクバク どくのくん？ (ぎゅー！) ドキがムネムネ止まらない
subtitles.english: Chomp, chomp, pounding? (Gyu!), my heart won't stop thumping

subtitles.original: 牛丼を食べるときは お口でフーフーして... って あー！
subtitles.english: When eating a beef bowl, blow on it first... like this, say 'Ah'!

subtitles.original: 口角がついちゃって かわいい
subtitles.english: It got on the corner of your mouth, cute

subtitles.original: 優しく丁寧だぞ。ふふ、いい子いい子
subtitles.english: Be gentle and careful. Hehe, good boy, good boy

subtitles.original: お腹いっぱいになっちゃったね
subtitles.english: You're full now, aren't you?

subtitles.original: 一緒に寝ちゃう？
subtitles.english: Wanna sleep together?

subtitles.original: おやすみなさーい！
subtitles.english: Good night!

subtitles.original: もしも君が シュンとしちゃっても
subtitles.english: Even if you feel a bit down

subtitles.original: ぎゅって ぎゅって ぎゅって 抱きしめてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll give you a big, big, big hug

subtitles.original: みんなで歌おう！
subtitles.english: Let's all sing!

subtitles.original: さあさ ぎゅーどんだ ぎゅーどんだ 一緒に食べよう
subtitles.english: Come on, it's beef bowl time, it's beef bowl time, let's eat together

subtitles.original: 君と何度でもハニーバニー そろそろふわわい
subtitles.english: With you any number of times, honey-bunny, getting light-headed soon

subtitles.original: ほろりお肉 お肉 詰まっちゃダメー！
subtitles.english: The melt-in-your-mouth meat, the meat, don't get choked up!

subtitles.original:
全部食べたいんだ 褒めちゃいな
なでなでよしよし ちゅっちゅっちゅ
subtitles.english:
I want to eat it all, so praise me,
there-there, good girl, kiss-kiss-kiss

subtitles.original: せーの、ぎゅーどん！
subtitles.english: One, two, Gyu-don!

subtitles.original: 大好き！ギュッとしてどーん！
subtitles.english: I love you! Hug me tight and BAM!

subtitles.original: まだまだどーん！ 銀の目覚めでもギュッとしてどーん！
subtitles.english: More and more BAM! Even with a silver awakening, hug me tight and BAM!

subtitles.original: ぎゅー！
subtitles.english: Gyu!

subtitles.original: 宝鐘マリン
subtitles.english: Houshou Marine

subtitles.original: 天音かなた
subtitles.english: Amane Kanata
